snippet.title: Brief Battles - Release Date Trailer | PS4 | Xbox One | PC
snippet.description:
May your butt reign supreme in Brief Battles! Use your underpants to fight your friends in this fast-paced, underwear-fueled party game. Coming to PS4, Xbox One and PC on May 7, 2019.

Introducing Crossover Underwearrior Skins!
- Yooka-Laylee Violet (Based on Yooka & Laylee from Yooka-Laylee)
- CommanderVideo Chad (Based on CommanderVideo from Bit.Trip Runner)
- Goo Kevin (Based on Goo from World of Goo)
- Machinarium Tubbins (Based on Josef from Machinarium)
- Toto Sparrow Deluxe (Based on the Red toto from Toto Temple Deluxe)
- Stumpy Kevin (Based on the Stumpt YouTube channel mascot, Stumpy)

Learn more about Brief Battles:
briefbattles.com
